subject: Mobidictum Conference 2025 Speaker - Rana
text:
Hello Rana,

We are very pleased to have you as a speaker at our conference in Istanbul, 21–22 October.

In order to create speaker profile and promotions, we need you to fill out this Speaker Registration form: https://form.jotform.com/242603789142964

Please get your ticket from here and apply code: "speaker2025"

Your session date and stage will be revealed in two weeks.

All sessions are in between 10:00 - 16:00

If you haven't booked your travel yet, we would like to remind you we have hotel discounts below the conference page.

On 20th October, there will be an Executive Mixer for Speakers and Executive Ticket holders; you are welcomed there.

Looking forward!

Kind regards,

Mobidictum Conference Team

We are very pleased to have you as a speaker at our conference in Istanbul, 21–22 October.

In order to create speaker profile and promotions, we need you to fill out this Speaker Registration form: https://form.jotform.com/242603789142964

Please get your ticket from here and apply code: "speaker2025"

Your session date and stage will be revealed in two weeks.

All sessions are in between 10:00 - 16:00

If you haven't booked your travel yet, we would like to remind you we have hotel discounts below the conference page.

On 20th October, there will be an Executive Mixer for Speakers and Executive Ticket holders; you are welcomed there.

Looking forward!

Kind regards,

Mobidictum Conference Team

text:
Hello Furkan,

We are very pleased to have you as a speaker at our conference in Istanbul, 21–22 October.

In order to create speaker profile and promotions, we need you to fill out this Speaker Registration form: https://form.jotform.com/242603789142964

Please get your ticket from here and apply code: "speaker2025"

Your session date and stage will be revealed in two weeks.

All sessions are in between 10:00 - 16:00

If you haven't booked your travel yet, we would like to remind you we have hotel discounts below the conference page.

On 20th October, there will be an Executive Mixer for Speakers and Executive Ticket holders; you are welcomed there.

Looking forward!

Kind regards,

Mobidictum Conference Team
